title: Calories in 6 Piece Chicken McNuggets
meta_description: Learn calories in chicken mcnuggets 6 piece from McDonald's, including full nutrition facts, protein, fat, carbs, and serving tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: McDonald's Chicken McNuggets, standard 6-piece serving, breaded and fried, no dipping sauce included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Values based on standard McDonald's data; check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: A 6-piece serving of Chicken McNuggets provides 250 kcal and 14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Homemade baked version (per piece, no added oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Chicken McNugget?
faqs.a: About 42 kcal per piece in a standard McDonald's serving.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 6 piece chicken mcnuggets?
faqs.a: Approximately 14 g of protein for the 6-piece serving.

faqs.q: Do chicken mcnuggets have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 pieces contain about 580 mg sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in chicken mcnuggets 6 piece?
faqs.a: Yes, around 14 g carbs total, mostly from the breading.

faqs.q: How does dipping sauce affect calories in chicken mcnuggets?
faqs.a: One sauce packet adds 50-110 kcal depending on type; sweet & sour is higher.
